entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -9

Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
